category.name: Integration.Configuring CAE
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: CAEShowConfigurationHeader
preference.preference_description: Enables the display of configuration headers in the Product and Model views of the CAE Manager application. Examples of configuration header information are: "Revision Rule", "Variant Rule", "Effectivity", "Incremental Change Context". The default value is true (information is displayed).
